sentence.Network_en: He did it under the name of Nimrod.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以尼姆罗德之名做了那件事.

sentence.Network_en: He looked at me in a very funny way that night after Nimrod went away.
sentence.Network_cn: 那天晚上,尼姆罗德走后,他怪模怪样地看着我.

sentence.Network_en: Cush also begot Nimrod who was the first man of might on earth.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡什还生了尼姆罗德,尼姆罗德是世上第一个力大无穷的人.
